ef = setup_efficient_frontier()
ef.min_volatility()
w1 = ef.weights
ef = setup_efficient_frontier()
prev_w = np.array([1 / ef.n_assets] * ef.n_assets)
ef.add_objective(objective_functions.transaction_cost, w_prev=prev_w)
ef.min_volatility()
w2 = ef.weights
assert np.abs(prev_w - w2).sum() < np.abs(prev_w - w1).sum()
